snippet: Leo Komarov scored two late goals, and Toronto beat the host Columbus Blue Jackets, 6-3, to give Mike Babcock his first victory as coach of the Maple Leafs.
lead_paragraph: Leo Komarov scored two late goals, and Toronto beat the host Columbus Blue Jackets, 6-3, to give Mike Babcock his first victory as coach of the Maple Leafs.

headline.main: Babcock Wins First as Leafs’ Coach
headline.print_headline: Babcock Wins First as Leafs’ Coach
